verses.verse: <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G963>Bethany<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G3767>So<s%> they <S%G4160>made<s%> Him a <S%G1173>supper<s%> <S%G1563>there,<s%> and <S%G3136>Martha<s%> was <S%G1247>serving;<s%> but <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table] with Him.

<S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> a <S%G3046>pound<s%> of <S%G4186>very<s%> <S%G4186>costly<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> of <S%G4101>pure<s%> <S%G3487>nard,<s%> and <S%G218>anointed<s%> the <S%G4228>feet<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G1591>wiped<s%> His <S%G4228>feet<s%> with her <S%G2359>hair;<s%> and the <S%G3614>house<s%> was <S%G4137>filled<s%> with the <S%G3744>fragrance<s%> of the <S%G3464>perfume.<s%>
But <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> who was <S%G3195>intending<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him, <S%G3004>said,<s%>

<S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> was <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3464>perfume<s%> not <S%G4097>sold<s%> for <S%G5145>three<s%> <S%G5145>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii,<s%> and <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G4434>poor<s%> [people]?"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> not <S%G3754>because<s%> he was <S%G3199>concerned<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4434>poor,<s%> but <S%G3754>because<s%> he was a <S%G2812>thief,<s%> and as he <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G1101>money<s%> <S%G1101>box,<s%> he used to <S%G941>pilfer<s%> what was <S%G906>put<s%> into it.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G863>"Let<s%> her <S%G863>alone,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that she may <S%G5083>keep<s%> it for the <S%G2250>day<s%> of My <S%G1780>burial.<s%>
"For the <S%G4434>poor<s%> you <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> with you, but you do not <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> Me."

The <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G1097>learned<s%> that He was <S%G1563>there;<s%> and they <S%G2064>came,<s%> not for Jesus' <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but that they might <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>
But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G1011>took<s%> <S%G1011>counsel<s%> that they might <S%G615>put<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> to <S%G615>death<s%> <S%G2532>also;<s%>
<S%G3754>because<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of him <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G5217>away,<s%> and were <S%G4100>believing<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

On the <S%G1887>next<s%> <S%G1887>day<s%> the <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%> who had <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>coming<s%> to <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%>

<S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G902>branches<s%> of the <S%G5404>palm<s%> <S%G5404>trees,<s%> and <S%G1831>went<s%> out to <S%G5222>meet<s%> Him, and [began] to <S%G2905>cry<s%> out, <S%G5614>"Hosanna!<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2147>finding<s%> a <S%G3678>young<s%> <S%G3678>donkey,<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> on it; as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%>
<S%G5399>"Fear<s%> not, <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G4622>Zion;<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> your <S%G935>King<s%> is <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G2521>seated<s%> on a donkey's <S%G4454>colt.<s%>"

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> did not <S%G1097>understand<s%> at the <S%G4413>first;<s%> but <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> they <S%G3403>remembered<s%> that <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> were <S%G1125>written<s%> of Him, and that they had <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to Him.

And <S%G3767>so<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> who were with Him <S%G3753>when<s%> He <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> out of the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%> and <S%G1453>raised<s%> him from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> were <S%G3140>bearing<s%> Him <S%G3140>witness.<s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G5221>went<s%> and <S%G5221>met<s%> Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> that He had <S%G4160>performed<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4592>sign.<s%>

The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another,<s%> "You <S%G2334>see<s%> that you are not <S%G5623>doing<s%> <S%G3762>any<s%> <S%G5623>good;<s%> <S%G2396>look,<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> has <S%G565>gone<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> Him."

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> were <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G305>going<s%> up to <S%G4352>worship<s%> at the <S%G1859>feast;<s%>

<S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> was from <S%G966>Bethsaida<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and [began to] <S%G2065>ask<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Sir,<s%> we <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G3708>see<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>"
<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G406>Andrew;<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> and <S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and they <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5610>hour<s%> has <S%G2064>come<s%> for the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> to be <S%G1392>glorified.<s%>

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361><s%> a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of <S%G4621>wheat<s%> <S%G4098>falls<s%> into the <S%G1093>earth<s%> and <S%G599>dies,<s%> it <S%G3306>remains<s%> by <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G3441>alone;<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G599>dies,<s%> it <S%G5342>bears<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2590>fruit.<s%>

"He who <S%G5368>loves<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G622>loses<s%> it; and he who <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G5590>life<s%> in <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> shall <S%G5442>keep<s%> it to <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G166>eternal.<s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1247>serves<s%> Me, let him <S%G190>follow<s%> Me; and <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G1510>am,<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall My <S%G1249>servant<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be; <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1247>serves<s%> Me, the <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G5091>honor<s%> him.

" <S%G3568>Now<s%> My <S%G5590>soul<s%> has become <S%G5015>troubled;<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> shall I <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3962>'Father,<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> Me from <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%>'? But for <S%G3778>this<s%> purpose I <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

<S%G3962>"Father,<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Thy <S%G3686>name.<s%>" There <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> out of <S%G3772>heaven:<s%> "I have <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> it, and will <S%G1392>glorify<s%> it <S%G3825>again.<s%>"

The <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> who <S%G2476>stood<s%> by and <S%G191>heard<s%> it, were <S%G3004>saying<s%> that it had <S%G1027>thundered<s%><S%G1096>;<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "An <S%G32>angel<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to Him."
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> has not <S%G1096>come<s%> for My <S%G1223>sake,<s%> but for your <S%G1223>sakes.<s%>
<S%G3568>"Now<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> is upon <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world;<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> the <S%G758>ruler<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> shall be <S%G1544>cast<s%> out.
"And I, <S%G1437>if<s%> I be <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up from the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> will <S%G1670>draw<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> to <S%G1683>Myself.<s%>"
But He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> to <S%G4591>indicate<s%> the <S%G4169>kind<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%> by <S%G4169>which<s%> He was to <S%G599>die.<s%>

The <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> Him, "We have <S%G191>heard<s%> out of the <S%G3551>Law<s%> that the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is to <S%G3306>remain<s%> <S%G165>forever;<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> can You <S%G3004>say,<s%> 'The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G5312>lifted<s%> up'? <S%G5101>Who<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "For a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G2089>longer<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> is <S%G1722>among<s%> you. <S%G4043>Walk<s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> that <S%G4653>darkness<s%> may not <S%G2638>overtake<s%> you; he who <S%G4043>walks<s%> in the <S%G4653>darkness<s%> does not <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he <S%G5217>goes.<s%>

<S%G5613>"While<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the <S%G5457>light,<s%> in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G5457>light.<s%>" <S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2980>spoke,<s%> and He <S%G565>departed<s%> and <S%G2928>hid<s%> Himself from them.
But though He had <S%G4160>performed<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> them, [yet] they were not <S%G4100>believing<s%> in Him;

that the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3004>spoke,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G4100>believed<s%> our <S%G189>report<s%>? And to <S%G5101>whom<s%> has the <S%G1023>arm<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> been <S%G601>revealed<s%>?"
For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> they <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G4100>believe,<s%> for <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%>

"He has <S%G5186>blinded<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and He <S%G4456>hardened<s%> their <S%G2588>heart;<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they <S%G3708>see<s%> with their <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and <S%G3539>perceive<s%> with their <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and be <S%G4762>converted,<s%> and I <S%G2390>heal<s%> them."
<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G3708>saw<s%> His <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> of Him.

<S%G3676>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G3305><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of the <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him, but <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> they were not <S%G3670>confessing<s%> [Him,] <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should be <S%G656>put<s%> out of the <S%G656>synagogue;<s%>
for they <S%G25>loved<s%> the <S%G1391>approval<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> the <S%G1391>approval<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "He who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me does not <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Me, but in Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
"And he who <S%G2334>beholds<s%> Me <S%G2334>beholds<s%> the One who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me.
"I have <S%G2064>come<s%> [as] <S%G5457>light<s%> into the <S%G2889>world,<s%> that <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me may not <S%G3306>remain<s%> in <S%G4653>darkness.<s%>

"And <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> My <S%G4487>sayings,<s%> and does not <S%G5442>keep<s%> them, I do not <S%G2919>judge<s%> him; for I did not <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> but to <S%G4982>save<s%> the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

"He who <S%G114>rejects<s%> Me, and does not <S%G2983>receive<s%> My <S%G4487>sayings,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> one who <S%G2919>judges<s%> him; the <S%G3056>word<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> is <S%G1565>what<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> him at the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

"For I did not <S%G2980>speak<s%> on My <S%G1683>own<s%> <S%G1683>initiative,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me has <S%G1325>given<s%> Me <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

"And I <S%G3609>know<s%> that His <S%G1785>commandment<s%> is <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the things I <S%G2980>speak,<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> has <S%G3004>told<s%> Me."
